video.title: The Wonder Years
video.synopsis: This classic show set in the 1960s chronicles the hapless life of Kevin, the youngest member of the Arnold clan, as he lurches his way into adulthood.

episodes.synopsis: Coming-of-age comedy series set in the late 1960s, focusing on the trials and tribulations of young Kevin Arnold and his family, as he enters junior high school and becomes a teenager.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: At Brian's funeral, all Kevin can think about is Winnie and their first kiss; and sex education begins at school, but Kevin and Paul get the feeling that their teacher isn't telling them everything that they need to know.
episodes.title: Swingers

episodes.synopsis: After Kevin asks his dad about what he does at work, Jack brings his son to work at NORCOM and shows him around. Kevin gets a glimpse into his father's life after spending the day with him, and in the end, he realizes that his father is a great man.
episodes.title: My Father's Office

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's older sister Karen doesn't communicate with her parents anymore, and it's all because of her new boyfriend, Louis. Things are only made worse when Louis comes to dinner. Kevin takes an immediate dislike to Louis.
episodes.title: Angel

episodes.synopsis: Kevin tries to get up the courage to call Lisa Berlini. Paul tries to find out if Lisa likes Kevin by consulting the junior high grapevine.
episodes.title: The Phone Call

episodes.synopsis: Kevin is madly infatuated with Lisa Berlini and asks her to the school dance. Things change quickly after Lisa accepts a date with another guy.
episodes.title: Dance with Me

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's nightmares are a telling sign of the new changes in his life, including befriending the tough kid at school.
episodes.title: The Heart of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Kevin develops a crush on Miss White after she has him play the role of Robert Kennedy in a play that she wrote.
episodes.title: Our Miss White

episodes.synopsis: Wayne and Kevin try to convince their father to buy a color TV for Christmas; and Kevin has to find a perfect present for Winnie after receiving one from her.
episodes.title: Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Now that Paul is dating, Kevin begins to pine more for Winnie.
episodes.title: Steady as She Goes

episodes.synopsis: It's a confusing mix-up as to who likes who at Kennedy Junior High.
episodes.title: Just Between Me and You and Kirk and Paul and Carla and Becky

episodes.synopsis: Norma is upset when she takes a pottery class and receives encouragement from everyone, except Jack.
episodes.title: Pottery Will Get You Nowhere

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's piano lessons has him in competition with Ronald Hirschmuller.
episodes.title: Coda

episodes.synopsis: Wayne's bullying of Kevin has been getting pretty out-of-hand lately; but when he interferes in a big way with Kevin and Paul's Science Project, Wayne may have gone too far.
episodes.title: Hiroshima, Mon Frere

episodes.synopsis: When Kevin sees that Paul is being humiliated at basketball during gym class, he decides to go to Coach Cutlip to complain about how he thinks teams are being unfairly picked.
episodes.title: Loosiers

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and the student council organize a walk-out to protest the Vietnam War. However, when the assistant principal, Mr. Diperna, finds out about the planned walkout, he threatens to suspend all who participate.
episodes.title: Walk Out

episodes.synopsis: Kevin learns the consequences of talking behind other people's backs.
episodes.title: Nemesis

episodes.synopsis: Driven by his love for Winnie, Kevin faces the school bully.
episodes.title: Fate

episodes.synopsis: Kevin feels left out when his birthday party is on the same day as Paul's Bar Mitzvah.
episodes.title: Birthday Boy

episodes.synopsis: Kevin discovers that Karen is planning to run away to San Francisco.
episodes.title: Brightwing

episodes.synopsis: Margaret Farquhar, the class weirdo, tries to befriend Kevin after he is partnered up with her in a square dance for gym class.
episodes.title: Square Dance

episodes.synopsis: Kevin, Paul, and Winnie come together to stop the destruction of Harper's Woods. Kevin and Winnie shared their first kiss in these woods, and they all used to play together there when they were younger.
episodes.title: Whose Woods Are These?

episodes.synopsis: As seventh grade comes to an end; Winnie's parents decide to get a divorce; and their teacher Miss White announces that she is getting married.
episodes.title: How I'm Spending My Summer Vacation

episodes.synopsis: During summer vacation, Kevin experiences his first French kiss and the heartbreak of a summer romance.
episodes.title: Summer Song

episodes.synopsis: Kevin runs into trouble when he thinks his math teacher is being unreasonable.
episodes.title: Math Class

episodes.synopsis: Kevin is obsessed with going to the mall after meeting a beautiful girl, but his only way to get there is from Wayne.
episodes.title: Wayne on Wheels

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's mother tries to stop him from playing tackle football, making Kevin think she's too overprotective of him.
episodes.title: Mom Wars

episodes.synopsis: The school production of "Our Town" hits trouble when Winnie gets stage fright.
episodes.title: On the Spot

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and Paul find new best friends after they get on one another's nerves.
episodes.title: Odd Man Out

episodes.synopsis: Kevin hopes that his father will buy a new, fancier car after their old one breaks beyond repair.
episodes.title: The Family Car

episodes.synopsis: Kevin gets his first pimple right before family friends comes to visit.
episodes.title: The Pimple

episodes.synopsis: To try and get ahead in math class, Kevin decides to cheat on his test, leading only to bigger problems.
episodes.title: Math Class Squared

episodes.synopsis: After seeing The Beatles on TV, Kevin joins a rock 'n' roll band.
episodes.title: Rock 'N' Roll

episodes.synopsis: A school dance has Kevin hoping to invite Susan Fisher, but ending-up with his lab partner.
episodes.title: Don't You Know Anything About Women?

episodes.synopsis: Jack gets mad at Grandpa Arnold when he comes to visit and gives Kevin a dog.
episodes.title: The Powers That Be

episodes.synopsis: After Carla breaks up with Paul, Kevin sets up Paul with Winnie, to make Carla jealous, but Paul ends up having feelings for Winnie.
episodes.title: She, My Friend and I

episodes.synopsis: Kevin brings Winnie a Valentine's Day card but accidentally puts it in Becky Slater's locker.
episodes.title: The St. Valentine's Day Massacre

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Kevin build a tree house and learn that the tree house provides a good view of the attractive neighbor next door.
episodes.title: The Tree House

episodes.synopsis: The new student teacher tries to make something more of The Glee Club but has no luck.
episodes.title: The Glee Club

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and Winnie are invited to a make-out party.
episodes.title: Night Out

episodes.synopsis: Kevin ponders his future as a class assignment has him writing his own obituary.
episodes.title: Faith

episodes.synopsis: Kevin is amazed that he is surviving the school's baseball tryouts, but finds out the coach is an old Army buddy of Jack's.
episodes.title: The Unnatural

episodes.synopsis: Kevin seeks tutoring help from his math teacher for a big test.
episodes.title: Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: Paul develops a crush on Mrs. Arnold after giving him a boost of confidence.
episodes.title: Cocoa and Sympathy

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Karen are constantly fighting as she is about to leave for college, fearing he is losing his little girl.
episodes.title: Daddy's Little Girl

episodes.synopsis: Kevin learns that the Coopers are moving across town, where Winnie will attend another school.
episodes.title: Moving

episodes.synopsis: As summer comes to a close it's time for Jack's company picnic, causing him fear of bumping into Mr."Deadwood" Detweiler and Kevin bumping into his tomboy daughter.
episodes.title: Growing Up

episodes.synopsis: The first day of ninth grade doesn't go as smoothly as Kevin had hoped, but ends nicely after meeting a beautiful girl who seems obsessed with him.
episodes.title: Ninth Grade Man

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and his friends travel cross town with beers in hand to gain entrance in a 10th graders slumber party.
episodes.title: The Journey

episodes.synopsis: Kevin gets his first job as working as a caddy at the golf club.
episodes.title: The Cost of Living

episodes.synopsis: "Kevin misses his anniversary with Winnie to work on an assignment with Madeline, but then loses the new bracelet Winnie gave him.
episodes.title: It's a Mad, Mad Madeline World

episodes.synopsis: Kevin gets guilted into taking Paul's sister, Debbie, to her cotillion.
episodes.title: Little Debbie

episodes.synopsis: Jack's request for a raise finds him with a new position, and on the road for Thanksgiving.
episodes.title: The Ties That Bind

episodes.synopsis: Kevin is surprised by Paul being picked by Coach Cutlip to be on the school's basketball team.
episodes.title: The Sixth Man

episodes.synopsis: Kevin sees a different side of Coach Cutlip after seeing him as a store Santa Claus at the mall.
episodes.title: A Very Cutlip Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Kevin runs for student body president against Becky Slater.
episodes.title: The Candidate

episodes.synopsis: A joint field trip with Winnie's new school at the museum causes elation for Kevin and fear for Winnie, who's hiding a secret from him.
episodes.title: Heartbreak

episodes.synopsis: Kevin gets Paul to throw a party as a ploy to get back with Winnie.
episodes.title: Denial

episodes.synopsis: Grandpa Arnold comes to town for a funeral of a relative no one could stand.
episodes.title: Whose Aunt Rose?

episodes.synopsis: Kevin fears looking like a fool in front of the new dental hygienist when he discovers he has a cavity that needs drilling.
episodes.title: Courage

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's dog Buster is in line for a neutering to end his constant barking.
episodes.title: Buster

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and his father go on an ill-fated shopping trip together for a new suit for Kevin.
episodes.title: Road Trip

episodes.synopsis: Norma's new job at school causes Kevin embarrassment.
episodes.title: When Worlds Collide

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and Wayne fight over who will move into Karen's room now that she's in college.
episodes.title: Separate Rooms

episodes.synopsis: Kevin job on the school yearbook committee finds him trying to find a perfect caption, without embarrassing a fat kid.
episodes.title: The Yearbook

episodes.synopsis: Kevin tries desperately to talk with Winnie after she is involved in a serious car accident.
episodes.title: The Accident

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Karen argue after discovering his daughter's roommate is a man.
episodes.title: The House That Jack Built

episodes.synopsis: Kevin is graduating from Junior High and that brings changes, finding out that Paul is going off to a private school next year.
episodes.title: Graduation

episodes.synopsis: The Pfeiffers and Arnolds go on vacation to the lake together, and Kevin has a summertime romance.
episodes.title: The Lake

episodes.synopsis: First day of High School is a disaster after Kevin's joke in class puts him in hot water with his teacher.
episodes.title: Day One

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's job at an old fashioned hardware store leaves much to be desired.
episodes.title: The Hardware Store

episodes.synopsis: Greaser Frankie enlists Kevin's help in fixing his romance with his girlfriend Denise.
episodes.title: Frank and Denise

episodes.synopsis: A night on the town finds Kevin cruisin' with his friends and mooning his parents by accident.
episodes.title: Full Moon Rising

episodes.synopsis: Wayne's girlfriend, Sandy, finds herself falling for Kevin instead.
episodes.title: Triangle

episodes.synopsis: Kevin tries out for a school's soccer team, a group of misfits with a former legend as their coach.
episodes.title: Soccer

episodes.synopsis: Jack's birthday dinner is a flop when Karen brings her live-in boyfriend.
episodes.title: Dinner Out

episodes.synopsis: No one is looking forward to the Arnold's annual Christmas party, and even less after the guests arrive.
episodes.title: Christmas Party

episodes.synopsis: Jealousy looms as the Pfeiffer's land on easy street after making a killing on a land deal that Jack turned down.
episodes.title: Pfeiffer's Choice

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's is fearing the test for his driver's license while hiding the fact he can't parallel park.
episodes.title: Road Test

episodes.synopsis: Grandpa's age has caught up with him after a series of car accidents gets him in trouble with the law.
episodes.title: Grandpa's Car

episodes.synopsis: Untraditional teacher Miss Shaw gets in trouble with the school by her unusual teaching methods.
episodes.title: Kodachrome

episodes.synopsis: Screw-up's Wayne and Wart decide to quit school and join the Army despite Jack's disapproval.
episodes.title: Private Butthead

episodes.synopsis: A smothered Kevin gets an awakening after dinner with Julie's parents shows a similarity to their own stifling relationship.
episodes.title: Of Mastodons and Men

episodes.synopsis: Winnie and Kevin reluctantly go on a double date, but their bickering only leads to their dates liking each other.
episodes.title: Double Double Date

episodes.synopsis: Kevin learns about true heroes after attending a school's basketball game with his father.
episodes.title: Hero

episodes.synopsis: The school cafeteria becomes the central headquarters for McKinley's social scene.
episodes.title: Lunch Stories

episodes.synopsis: Paul misses out on a date with the guys to see an R-rated movie but encounters an R-rated evening with a college student.
episodes.title: Carnal Knowledge

episodes.synopsis: An evening alone has Kevin thinking of having a poker game which soon turns into the party of the year.
episodes.title: The Lost Weekend

episodes.synopsis: Karen returns home after an argument with Michael, and refuses to divulge the reason they are fighting.
episodes.title: Stormy Weather

episodes.synopsis: Karen's wedding brings problems when they decide they would like a non-traditional ceremony.
episodes.title: The Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Kevin takes Paul on a joy ride up to the lake where he met Cara.
episodes.title: Back to the Lake

episodes.synopsis: Winnie is upset at Kevin at the hamburger stand, and they recall the history of their relationship together.
episodes.title: Broken Hearts and Burgers

episodes.synopsis: Wayne's friend Wart returns home from Vietnam a changed man, as found out during the homecoming football game.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: The annual father-son fishing trip is weighted down by all of the problems that arise which threaten the fate of future trips.
episodes.title: Fishing

episodes.synopsis: A wedding for the daughter of Jack's boss finds a bridesmaid hitting on Kevin, Jack's boss hitting on Norma, and Wayne once had a relationship with the bride.
episodes.title: Scenes from a Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's job as a house painter for a sexy teacher turns out to be real work when his co-worker's turn out to be goof-off's.
episodes.title: Sex and Economics

episodes.synopsis: Winnie volunteering for a handsome political candidate has Kevin jealous.
episodes.title: Politics as Usual

episodes.synopsis: An innocent mistake has Kevin bragging that he and Winnie spent the night together.
episodes.title: White Lies

episodes.synopsis: Wayne has a new girlfriend Bonnie, a 23 year old divorcee with a baby.
episodes.title: Wayne and Bonnie

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's new job as a Chinese food delivery boy has him too busy to spend time with Winnie.
episodes.title: Kevin Delivers

episodes.synopsis: Jack is frustrated after getting a lukewarm evaluation as "competent" at work. Meanwhile, Kevin, Winnie and Paul are all studying for their SAT exams.
episodes.title: The Test

episodes.synopsis: After seeing Winnie at the mall with a big Christmas gift in hand, Kevin feels the need to buy her something special. Meanwhile, Jack is trying to get a loan to buy a new business.
episodes.title: Let Nothing You Dismay

episodes.synopsis: New Year's finds Wayne and Bonnie treating the Arnold family to dinner at a nightclub, but ends-up in heartbreak when Bonnie reunites with the father of her son.
episodes.title: New Years

episodes.synopsis: Kevin can get a great deal on a car from Alice's father, but fears she is falling for him.
episodes.title: Alice in Autoland

episodes.synopsis: Kevin, Winnie and the guys follow a rumor that the Rolling Stones are playing in a bar just out of town, but to get there Kevin must sneak out in his dad's new car.
episodes.title: Ladies and Gentlemen...The Rolling Stones

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and Winnie fix Jeff up with the new girl in school. However, Jeff is reluctant to commit to the relationship because of his attachment to an old girlfriend back home.
episodes.title: Unpacking

episodes.synopsis: Kevin feels he has been recruited to be on the school's wrestling team, but when the coach pushes him to try harder, he thinks about quitting.
episodes.title: Hulk Arnold

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's friend, Ricky, falls in love with a girl that has a huge nose. Ricky's feelings are hurt when he overhears the guys joking about it.
episodes.title: Nose

episodes.synopsis: A school field trip finds Winnie upset at Kevin after he says that she is perfect during a game of truth or dare.
episodes.title: Eclipse

episodes.synopsis: As Kevin and his friends play poker, we learn that Chuckie fearing his girlfriend may be pregnant, Randy is failing at school, and Paul is too stuffy for the other guys liking.
episodes.title: Poker

episodes.synopsis: It's a case of the men vs. the women when Winnie scores higher than Kevin on her SAT's; and Norma gets a high-paying job in a new company.
episodes.title: The Little Women

episodes.synopsis: The Arnold's go back to Norma's hometown to attend her 25-year high school reunion.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Kevin chases after Winnie who has taken a job at a out of town country club as a lifeguard.
episodes.title: Summer

episodes.synopsis: Kevin is heartbroken when he finds out Winnie is dating one of the other lifeguards. Forced to return home by hitch-hiking, Kevin and Winnie must wait out a storm together in a barn.
episodes.title: Independence Day
